original_text: If you do that, God will give you peace in your minds. That peace is so great that nobody can completely understand it. You will not worry or be afraid, because you belong to Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 그리하면 모든 지각에 뛰어난 하나님의 평강이 그리스도 예수 안에서 너희 마음과 생각을 지키시리라

sentences.original_text: God will give you peace in your minds
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 당신의 마음에 평화를 주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that nobody can completely understand it
You will not worry or be afraid
because you belong to Christ Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 당신은 그리스도 예수께 속해 있기 때문입니다
